title: FOIL Method
text: The F stands for First, where we multiply the first component of each terms first. $$4x\times2 x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The O stands for Outer, where we multiply the first component of the second term with the $$\frac{second}{outer}$$ component of the second term. $$4x \left(-5\right)$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The I stands for Inner, where we multiply the inner components. $$3\times2 x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The L stands for Last, where we multiply the last component of each terms. $$3\left(-5\right)$$

title: Simplify
text: Simplify by combining the like terms. $$(-20x$$ and 6x)
